solution_line_template: To get the perimeter, you add all the sides o the triangles, so the first two sides add up to {side1}+{side2} = <<{side1}+{side2}={sum_first_two}>>{sum_first_two} cm.
If the perimeter of the triangle is {perimeter}, the remaining side is {perimeter}-{sum_first_two} = <<{perimeter}-{sum_first_two}={third_side}>>{third_side} cm.
